triumph1.description: Discover and unlock the Gofannon Forge
triumph1.name: Gofannon Forge discovered

triumph2.description: Discover and unlock the Izanami Forge
triumph2.name: Izanami Forge discovered

triumph3.description: In Season 4, complete the weekly challenge in Gambit.
triumph3.name: Weekly Challenge

triumph4.description: Explore the Empty Tank on the Tangled Shore.
triumph4.name: Seedy Underbelly

triumph5.description: Complete Nightfall strike "Warden of Nothing" without taking any Solar damage during the final encounter.
triumph5.name: Solar Dance
